result.ga: thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráid

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.ponchtml: ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
